languages.text:
Whenever the wearer performs an {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g}, they instantly provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} from all adjacent enemies.
The wearer gains +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u> temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} for each attack of opportunity provoked by an area attack.

traits.locale_text:
Whenever the wearer performs an {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g}, they instantly provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}attacks of opportunity{/g} from all adjacent enemies.
The wearer gains +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u> temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} for each attack of opportunity provoked by an area attack.

Whenever the wearer performs an {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g}, they instantly provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} from all adjacent enemies.
The wearer gains +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u> temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} for each attack of opportunity provoked by an area attack.

languages.text:
每当装备者进行{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}区域攻击{/g}时，都会立刻让身边所有敌人发动{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}。
装备者每受到范围攻击引发的借机攻击时，都会获得临时{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}，等同于<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}</u>。
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer performs an {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g}, they instantly provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} from all adjacent enemies.
The wearer gains +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u> temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} for each attack of opportunity provoked by an area attack.

traits.locale_text:
每当装备者进行{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}区域攻击{/g}时，都会立刻让身边所有敌人发动{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}借机攻击{/g}。
装备者每受到范围攻击引发的借机攻击时，都会获得临时{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}，等同于<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}</u>。

languages.text:
Когда персонаж совершает {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}атаку по области{/g}, все противники на соседних клетках немедленно совершают {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаки по возможности{/g}.
За каждую из этих атак по возможности персонаж получает <u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}ВЫН{/g}</u> временного {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}.
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer performs an {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g}, they instantly provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} from all adjacent enemies.
The wearer gains +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u> temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} for each attack of opportunity provoked by an area attack.

traits.locale_text:
Когда персонаж совершает {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}атаку по области{/g}, все противники на соседних клетках немедленно совершают {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}атаки по возможности{/g}.
За каждую из этих атак по возможности персонаж получает <u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}ВЫН{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временного здоровья{/g}.

Когда персонаж совершает {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}атаку по области{/g}, все противники на соседних клетках немедленно совершают {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}атаки по возможности{/g}.
За каждую из этих атак по возможности персонаж получает <u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}ВЫН{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временного здоровья{/g}.

languages.text:
使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}範囲攻撃{/g}を行うたびに、近接する敵すべての{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}を直ちに誘発する。
使用者は、範囲攻撃によって誘発されたそれぞれの機会攻撃で、<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}の</u>一時{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}負傷{/g}を獲得する。
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer performs an {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g}, they instantly provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} from all adjacent enemies.
The wearer gains +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u> temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} for each attack of opportunity provoked by an area attack.

traits.locale_text:
使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}範囲攻撃{/g}を行うたびに、近接する敵すべての{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}機会攻撃{/g}を直ちに誘発する。
使用者は、範囲攻撃によって誘発されたそれぞれの機会攻撃で、<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}の</u>一時{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}負傷{/g}を獲得する。

languages.text:
Si el portador realiza un {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}ataque de área{/g}, provoca {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataques de oportunidad{/g} a los enemigos adyacentes al instante.
El portador obtiene una <u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}RES{/g} </u> de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} temporales por cada ataque de oportunidad provocado por un ataque de área.
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer performs an {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g}, they instantly provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} from all adjacent enemies.
The wearer gains +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u> temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} for each attack of opportunity provoked by an area attack.

traits.locale_text:
Si el portador realiza un {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}ataque de área{/g}, provoca {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}ataques de oportunidad{/g} a los enemigos adyacentes al instante.
El portador obtiene una <u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}RES{/g} </u> de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} temporales por cada ataque de oportunidad provocado por un ataque de área.

languages.text:
Immer wenn der Träger einen {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Flächenangriff{/g} ausführt, provoziert er sofort {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriffe{/g} von allen angrenzenden Feinden.
Der Träger erhält +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}ZÄH{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g}</u> temporäre {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} für jeden durch einen Flächenangriff provozierten Gelegenheitsangriff.
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer performs an {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g}, they instantly provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} from all adjacent enemies.
The wearer gains +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u> temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} for each attack of opportunity provoked by an area attack.

traits.locale_text:
Immer wenn der Träger einen {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Flächenangriff{/g} ausführt, provoziert er sofort {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}Gelegenheitsangriffe{/g} von allen angrenzenden Feinden.
Der Träger erhält +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}ZÄH{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g}</u> temporäre {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} für jeden durch einen Flächenangriff provozierten Gelegenheitsangriff.

languages.text:
Chaque fois que l'utilisateur lance une {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}attaque de zone{/g}, il provoque instantanément des {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaques d'opportunité{/g} de la part de tous les ennemis adjacents.
L'utilisateur reçoit +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}E{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} temporaires par attaque d'opportunité provoquée par une attaque de zone.

The wearer gains +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u> temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} for each attack of opportunity provoked by an area attack.

L'utilisateur reçoit +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}RES{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} temporaires par attaque d'opportunité provoquée par une attaque de zone.

Chaque fois que l'utilisateur lance une {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}attaque de zone{/g}, il provoque instantanément des {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}attaques d'opportunité{/g} de la part de tous les ennemis adjacents.
L'utilisateur reçoit +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}RES{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} temporaires par attaque d'opportunité provoquée par une attaque de zone.
